data.title: Photo recap: BIFOLD New Year's reception
data.meta_description: At its New Year's reception BIFOLD welcomed a series of distinguished guests and friends from Berlin's AI community.
data.text:
Kicking off 2024

On January 10th, 2024, the Berlin Institute for the Foundations of Learning and Data (BIFOLD) at TU Berlin invited partners and friends to its New Year's reception: An inspiring kickoff for a year full of scientific challenges in AI, Machine Learning and Data Management. It was amazing to see how much BIFOLD has already grown and achieved since its inception.

The reception was attended by notable guests, including the State Secretary for Science and Research for the Berlin Senate, Dr. Henry Marx, TU Berlin President Prof. Dr. Geraldine Rauch together with three of her colleagues from the Executive Board of TU Berlin, Prof. Dr. -Ing.habil. Stephan Völker, Christian Schröder and Lars Oeverdieck as well as Prof. Dr. Volkmar Falk, Medical Director Department of Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery and representative of BIFOLDs institutional partner Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin. The event was kicked off with a speech by BIFOLD Co-Director Prof. Dr. Volker Markl, followed by greetings from Prof. Dr. med. Volkmar Falk and BIFOLD-Fellow Prof. Dr.-Ing. Thomas Wiegand (Executive Director of the Fraunhofer Heinrich Hertz Institute).

Many partners and friends from academia, business, and society were also present, including representatives from Aignostics, BASF Metabolome Solutions, Berlin Institute for Medical Systems Biology, Berlin-Brandenburgische Akademie der Wissenschaften, Berlin University of Applied Sciences, Bundeskanzleramt, Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin, Der Mittelstand. BVMW e. V., Deutsche Bahn AG, eco - Verband der Internetwirtschaft e.V., EIT ICT LABS GERMANY, Falling Walls Foundation, Forum Digitale Technologien, Freie Universität Berlin, Google, Green parliamentary group in the Berlin House of Representatives, Hasso-Plattner-Institut, Humboldt-Innovation, Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin, K.I.E.Z., Leibniz Universität Hannover, Max Delbrück Center, Max Planck Institute for the History of Science, Merantix Momentum, Mittelstand-Digital Zentrum Berlin, Robert Koch-Institut, Schweizerische Botschaft in Deutschland, Snowflake Computing, MATH+, Universität der Künste, Weizenbaum-Institut, Weierstrass Institute, and the Zuse Institut Berlin.

The evening was a great start to the year 2024.
